title: Corrupted Files
body: When I try to conect to a game, the loading screen won't even come up, just the bug slat error report. When I exit the client, I do the Hextech repair tool to check everything then I bring up the launcher and it brings up the "There may be corrupted files that need to be scanned and repaired". So, I'm currently doing that now. Will I get leaverbuster even when it is litereally impossible for me to connect to a game while it scans?

replies.body: No, you'd have to leave a lot of games to get a leaver buster. You don't get bent over for one game. That said, I get that corrupted crap all the time. League is the only game this happens with but I'm used to League having a lot of issues at this point.

> [{quoted}](name=Noxe Out,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=hZdg429G,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-08-16T06:34:42.093+0000)
>
> No, you'd have to leave a lot of games to get a leaver buster. You don't get bent over for one game. That said, I get that corrupted crap all the time. League is the only game this happens with but I'm used to League having a lot of issues at this point.

Yeah, it's really annoying.

Like Noxe Out mentioned, [Leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) doesn't result from just a single game.  It will still count as a leave and regardless of intent, because it still causes other players a negative experience.  Hopefully, this repair will get you fixed up and get you back in the game.  Let me know if you have any questions!
